pr_title: chore: add back dummy mapValues at table source for SR-enabled joins

timeline.message: chore: add back dummy mapValues at table source for SR-enabled joins

timeline.bodyText: I'm not sure why Github is rendering this file as having been deleted. A new version is added back in the third commit in this PR (see 58da19f#diff-8f6edbed395aac8e9c455d95a9bee5855dcb0d8230b2b280d50093def7198380) but GitHub isn't displaying the new file for some reason?
timeline.author: vcrfxia

replies.bodyText: Same thing with the other "deleted" files in this PR. I'm hoping this is a Github bug and that the new files (added in the third commit) aren't being lost somehow.
replies.author: vcrfxia

replies.bodyText: yeah, looks like the third commit adds things back. Also jenkins would fail if they weren't added back because of PlannedTestsUpToDatTest, right?
replies.author: agavra

replies.bodyText: That's the hope...! (Yes, I verified locally :) )
replies.author: vcrfxia
